job.title: Tech Sales Representative (Remote / Entry Level)
job.description:
Find your purpose & find your future!


Tech Sales is about more than just financial rewards. It's your chance to work remotely in a career of unlimited opportunity that challenges, inspires, and grows with you.


Launch your career in the thriving Tech industry with Satellite's Career Accelerator. Like our other successful students, advance from your current job and start earning $60k+ per year.


Over the course of our comprehensive 6-week program taught by industry professionals, you will learn the skills and make the connections you need to land a job with an outstanding tech company in our hiring network. We provide coaching, mentorship, and ongoing support; you just need to bring your energy and motivated self. Course tuition is fully covered by our generous community partners, so the only cost to you is a nominal $100 onboarding fee.


Begin your transformation today!
